Articles.Content:
Only if they are Kerbal Kiwi's!

Anyhow, to infinity and beyond...

Glad to be aboard.

BTW, I am sure this "game" will one day unite the planet in a spirit of friendship and peace never seen before on the planet.

From what I have seen on this forum, that it was hacked, proves my point. Even the evildoers know this site is a threat to their existence.

Anyhow... to the Mun and beyond.... no matter now many Kerbals it takes... electronic life is cheap... a kerbals, more so.
Glad to have you on board as well, Kiwi1960
